aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Adobe XD
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Adobe XD is a vector-based design tool for designing and prototyping user experiences for websites and mobile apps.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Figma
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Figma is a collaborative interface design tool used for creating user interfaces, prototypes, and design systems.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Sketch
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Sketch is a vector-based design tool for UI/UX designers, allowing them to create interactive prototypes and user interfaces.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Zeplin
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Zeplin is a collaboration tool for designers and developers, allowing them to create and share design specs, assets, and style guides.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: InVision
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: InVision is a digital product design platform that allows designers to create interactive prototypes, collaborate with stakeholders, and gather feedback.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Marvel
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Marvel is a design and prototyping platform that enables front-end designers to create interactive mockups and wireframes for web and mobile applications.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Proto.io
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Proto.io is a prototyping tool for designing interactive prototypes and animations for web and mobile apps, without writing code.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Balsamiq
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Balsamiq is a wireframing tool that allows front-end designers to create low-fidelity wireframes and mockups for web and mobile applications.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Webflow
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Webflow is a no-code website builder that enables front-end designers to design, build, and launch responsive websites visually.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Adobe Dreamweaver
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Adobe Dreamweaver is a code editor and web design tool that allows front-end designers to visually design and code responsive websites.

aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.name: Framer
aiToolsForFrontEndDesigners.description: Framer is an advanced prototyping tool that combines design and development functionalities, allowing front-end designers to create interactive prototypes with animations, gestures, and complex interactions.
